item.title: HyperSpy 0.8.1 has been released!
item.description: This is a maintenance release that fixes an issue with the Python installers. Those who have successfully installed v0.8.1 do not need to upgrade.

item.title: Citing HyperSpy
item.description: HyperSpy can now be cited using our brand new D.O.I. See how to cite HyperSpy or click on the DOI badge below for details.

item.title: HyperSpy Workshop @ Cambridge (UK), 13th of April 2015
item.description: Multi-dimensional data analysis with Python and HyperSpy Workshop. Registration and more information here.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new release of Hyperspy.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.3 has been released!
item.description: New maintenance release to solve a library compatibility issue.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.2 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new maintenance release of Hyperspy.

item.title: New demos section
item.description: The examples section in the HyperSpy website has been replaced by a new demos section.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.1 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new maintenance release of Hyperspy.

item.title: HyperSpy practical at the SuperSTEM Summer School
item.description: The 6th biennial SuperSTEM Summer School (4-7 July 2014, Daresbury UK) includes a HyperSpy practial.

item.title: HyperSpy training at the IMC2014
item.description: HyperSpy training at the IMC2014 on the 7th of September 2014 in Prague, Czech Republic.

item.title: HyperSpy talks and training at SHIRE2014
item.description: Two HyperSpy-related talks and a HyperSpy training @ SHIRE2014 on the 10-11 April 2014 in Sheffield, UK.

item.title: HyperSpy tutorial at the SFmu2013
item.description: A tutorial on analysis of multidimensional spectra using HyperSpy is available as part of the official program of SFMu 2013.
